1.name: Joystick control
1.description:
Test the joystick control of the motors.

Success criteria:
The motors respond correctly to joystick inputs following the controller.

options: Four motors and the step motors are driven

targets: ESC and motor do not overheat

2.name: Flight mode switching
2.description: The button for switching flight mode is pressed mid-flight.
2.success: The flight mode switches correctly without errors.

options: Four motors and the step motors are driven

targets: ESC and motor do not overheat
